mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT(ID, POST_ID, MEMBER_ID, REPORT_REASON,REPORT_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{postId}, #{memberId},#{reportReason},#{reportStatus})
mapper.select:
SELECT RP2.ID, RP2.MEMBER_ID, RP2.CREATED_DATE, RP2.POST_TITLE, RP2.POST_VIEW, RP2.REPLY_COUNT, RP2.REPORT_REASON, RP2.REPORT_STATUS FROM ( SELECT RP1.*, ROWNUM AS R FROM ( SELECT RP.ID, U.MEMBER_ID, P.CREATED_DATE, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_VIEW, COUNT(RE.ID) AS REPLY_COUNT, RP.REPORT_REASON, RP.REPORT_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT RP JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON RP.MEMBER_ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_POST P ON RP.POST_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REPLY RE ON P.ID = RE.POST_ID GROUP BY RP.ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, P.CREATED_DATE, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_VIEW, RP.REPORT_REASON, RP.REPORT_STATUS ORDER BY RP.ID DESC ) RP1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) RP2 WHERE RP2.R >= #{startRow}
